title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up in connecting derby database
description: When connecting a derby database to a project in the Data Explorer view, the column icons do not show up in the Available Items section.
OB: When expanding the Data Source by clicking the related icon in the Available Items section, the column icons are not displayed.
EB: The expected behavior is that the column icons should show up in the Available Items section when expanding the Data Source.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new project.
2. Create a new report.
3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source.
  - Set the Driver Class to com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver.
  - Set the Database URL to jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui.
  - Set the User Name to root.
  - Set the Password to root.
4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset.
5. In the Edit Data Set window, select Query.
6. [Please provide additional steps to reproduce the issue, if available.]
